Module sce.cz2002.cyhm.first
Package CZ2002_Assignment

Class Table

java.lang.Object
CZ2002_Assignment.Table
public class Table extends Object
Entity Class for Tables in the Restaurant Tables store data for Seat Capacity, Occupation and Reservation Status

      public Table​(int seatCapacity, boolean isOccupied, boolean isReserved)
      Constructor for Table Class

      seatCapacity - number of maximum seats the Table can contain
      isOccupied - boolean to indicate whether Table is occupied
      isReserved - boolean to indicate whether Table is reserved
